{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, ACE2 is expressed on cell surfaces. Document [1] also mentions that the virus gains access to host cells when the S-protein binds to the host cell surface receptor ACE2. Additionally, Document [2] describes ACE2 as a membrane protein located on the surface of intestinal enterocytes, renal tubular cells, and other cells.
